root.title: Official Homepage | Serein Shop
root.description: Shop for quality men's and women's fashion.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password | Serein Shop
forgotPassword.description: Request a password reset for your Serein Shop account.

login.title: Log In | Serein Shop
login.description: Log in to your Serein Shop account to continue shopping and manage orders.

register.title: Create Account | Serein Shop
register.description: Create a new account at Serein Shop to receive many attractive offers.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password | Serein Shop
resetPassword.description: Create a new password for your Serein Shop account.

verifyEmail.title: Verify Email | Serein Shop
verifyEmail.description: Complete the verification of your email address.

wishlist.title: Your Wishlist | Serein Shop
wishlist.description: View and manage the products you've liked at Serein Shop.

cart.title: Your Cart | Serein Shop
cart.description: Review products in your cart and proceed to checkout at Serein Shop.

checkout.title: Checkout | Serein Shop
checkout.description: Complete your order information at Serein Shop.

products.title: All Products | Serein Shop
products.description: Explore the diverse product collection at Serein Shop.

profile.title: Account Information | Serein Shop
profile.description: Manage your personal information and password settings.

orders.title: Order History | Serein Shop
orders.description: Review the orders you have placed at Serein Shop.

orderDetails.title: Order Details #{id} | Serein Shop
orderDetails.description: View details for your order #{id} at Serein Shop.

vouchers.title: Voucher Wallet | Serein Shop
vouchers.description: View and manage your discount codes and vouchers.

NotFoundPage.title: Oops! Page Not Found

ForgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot Password
ForgotPasswordPage.instructions: Enter your registered email address. We will send you a link (or OTP code) to reset your password.

ForgotPasswordPage.failureMessage: Failed to send request. Please try again.

RegisterPage.title: Create Account

validation.passwordMismatch: Password and confirmation do not match.
validation.passwordComplexity: Password must be at least 6 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character (!@#$%^&*).

RegisterPage.registerSuccessMessage: Registration successful. Please check your email to verify.

ResetPasswordPage.title: Reset Password

ResetPasswordPage.passwordLengthError: Password must be at least 6 characters.
ResetPasswordPage.invalidTokenError: Invalid or expired password reset token.

VerifyEmailPage.title: Verify Email

VerifyEmailPage.resendButton: Didn't receive the code? Resend OTP
VerifyEmailPage.resendSuccessMessage: A new OTP has been sent. Please check your email.
VerifyEmailPage.missingEmailError: Email information not found for verification.

CartPreviewModal.loadingErrorSubtitle: An error occurred while loading your cart information.

CheckoutPage.loadingErrorMessage: Could not retrieve cart information for checkout.
